ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and remove your load from you
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and relieve you of the burden
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And relieve you of the burden –
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And removed from you your burden.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And taken off from you your burden,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and lift from thee thy burden,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And eased thee of the burden
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We have taken off from thee thy burthen,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and relieve you of your burden
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And removed from thee thy burden
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And removed from you your burden,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and relieved you of your burden
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And lift from you your burden.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We removed from you your burden
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [94:2] and relieve you of your burden,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: He said again: (And eased thee of the burden) We lifted your sins from you
